channel.title: Classification on Satyak's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Classification on Satyak's Portfolio

item.title: Telecom Customer Churn Prediction
item.description: Project Summary Predicting which customer will most likely leave the network in advance will help the network provider to provide them with proper plans that will make them happy.

item.title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
item.description: Project Summary The dataset contains transactions made by credit cards in September 2013 by European cardholders.

item.title: Iris Flower Species Prediction
item.description: Project Summary The Iris flower data set is a multivariate data set introduced by the British statistician and biologist Ronald Fisher in his 1936 paper The use of multiple measurements in taxonomic problems.

item.title: Titanic Survival Prediction
item.description: Project Summary The sinking of the Titanic is one of the most infamous shipwrecks in history.
